results.definition: persist for a specified period of time
examples: The bad weather lasted for three days

results.definition: the time at which life ends; continuing until dead
examples: a struggle to the last

results.definition: the item at the end
examples: last, I'll discuss family values

results.definition: not to be altered or undone
examples: the arbiter will have the last say

results.definition: holding device shaped like a human foot that is used to fashion or repair shoes
the temporal end; the concluding time
continue to live and avoid dying
examples: how long can a person last without food and water?

results.definition: occurring at or forming an end or termination
examples: the last days of the dinosaurs

results.definition: conclusive in a process or progression
examples: a last resort

results.definition: highest in extent or degree
examples: to the last measure of human endurance
whether they were accomplices in the last degree or a lesser one was...to be determined individually

results.definition: lowest in rank or importance
examples: last prize
in last place

results.definition: the final stage or concluding parts of an event or occurrence
examples: I had to miss the last of the movie

results.definition: a person's dying act; the final thing a person can do
examples: he breathed his last

results.definition: a unit of capacity for grain equal to 80 bushels
inRegion: united kingdom of great britain and northern ireland

results.definition: a unit of weight equal to 4,000 pounds
coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining
examples: the last time I saw Paris
the last day of the month
had the last word
waited until the last minute
he raised his voice in a last supreme call
the last game of the season
down to his last nickel

results.definition: immediately past
examples: last Thursday
the last chapter we read

results.definition: most unlikely or unsuitable
examples: the last person we would have suspected
the last man they would have chosen for the job

results.definition: occurring at the time of death
examples: his last words
the last rites

results.definition: the last or lowest in an ordering or series
examples: he was the last to leave
he finished an inglorious last
